title: Fav movie here's why
review: This is my favorite movie ever I have to be honest, some parts look fake, some parts are unnecessarily unrealistic, and most of the time it's not even scary. Anyhoo, the reason why I love this movie is the comedic moments which make a movie enjoyable to me, and the horror and scary elements, those two things make the perfect movie

title: okay
review: This is a cartoonish unrealistic and silly film itself but it doesn't make it bad to me it makes it entertaining but at some points I think it makes it dumb.
